# Wars (album)

| noprose   = yes
}}
Wars is the third album from American hardcore group XBXRX, released in April 2007 on Polyvinyl Records.
Track listing
All songs by XBXRX.
#"Centre Where Sight" – 4:06
#"Freezing Water" – 2:06
#"Sheets and Organs" – 2:09
#"Here to Ruin the Party" – 2:19
#"Eighth War" – 2:21
#"Suffocation" – 1:14
#"Minds" – 2:25
#"Sons of Horn" – 1:21
#"In Veins" – 2:17
#"Towers of Silence" – 3:14
#"Day Eleven" – 1:31
#"Ear Ever Hear" – 2:16
